forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the weather unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, offering a pleasant escape from the urban hustle. Temperatures hover around a comfortable 68 degrees, gradually slipping to 66, paired with a gentle west-southwest breeze that adds a refreshing touch, whispering promises of warmth interspersed with occasional gusts. The clarity is remarkable—there’s a vividness to the skyline, a crisp definition against the cerulean backdrop, though the marine layer lingers just beyond the hills, hinting that it may make a subtle return as daylight wanes.

As night draws closer, the skies will begin to shroud themselves in clouds, dipping into a cooler realm with temperatures settling at about 57 degrees. This gradual transformation calls for a jacket or a light sweater, suitable for an evening stroll or a relaxed gathering at one of the city’s inviting parks, perhaps savoring the sounds of the gentle bay while wrapped in the embrace of twilight. A perfect time to engage with the evening’s mellow rhythm, whether it's enjoying a quiet moment by the waterfront or exploring the diverse culinary offerings that thrive in this vibrant neighborhood.
